Skip to contents
woodendesc 0.1.0
  • Reference

Function reference

High-level wrappers

Functions that take a vector of repositories to query.

wood_packages()
Collect available packages from multiple repositories
wood_versions()
Collect all package versions from multiple repositories
wood_dependencies()
Find dependencies from multiple repositories

Functions specialized by repository type

Functions specialized to query a single repository type with custom cache systems.

CRAN

wood_cran_packages()
List available packages on CRAN
wood_cran_versions()
Get all package versions on CRAN
wood_cran_latest()
Get latest package version on CRAN
wood_cran_dependencies()
Get dependencies of a package on CRAN

Bioconductor

wood_bioc_packages()
List available packages in Bioconductor
wood_bioc_version()
Get available package version in Bioconductor
wood_bioc_dependencies()
Get dependencies of a package in Bioconductor
wood_bioc_releases()
List Bioconductor releases

GitHub

wood_github_packages()
List available package on a Github account
wood_github_versions()
Get all tagged package versions on GitHub
wood_github_latest()
Get current package version on GitHub
wood_github_tags()
List GitHub tags for a repository
wood_github_dependencies()
Get dependencies of a package on GitHub

R-universe

wood_runiverse_packages()
List available packages in one of R universes
wood_runiverse_version()
Get current package version in one of R universes
wood_runiverse_dependencies()
Get dependencies of a package in one of R universes

Any URL

wood_url_packages()
List available packages in any repository
wood_url_version()
Get current package version in any repository
wood_url_dependencies()
Get dependencies of a package in any repository

Local libraries

wood_local_packages()
List locally available packages
wood_local_versions()
Get locally available package versions
wood_local_dependencies()
Get dependencies of locally available package

Core packages

wood_core_packages()
List core R packages
wood_core_version()
Get current version of a core R package
wood_core_dependencies()
Get dependencies of a core R package

Other functions

Functions that do not query anything, but help use woodendesc in some other way.

wood_clear_cache()
Clear cache
filter_dependencies filter_dependencies.wood_deps filter_dependencies.wood_dep_squashed filter_dependencies.wood_dep_list filter_dependencies.NULL
Filter dependencies by type
squash()
Compress dependencies of multiple packages

On this page
